origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'LeasingAPI.compare_plans', 'description': 'This function compares leasing plans based on the type of vehicle, lease duration, and initial payment.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'vehicleType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of vehicle, e.g., luxury, economy.'}, {'name': 'leaseDuration', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The duration of the lease in months.'}, {'name': 'initialPayment', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The initial payment amount.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparisonResult', 'description': 'The comparison result of different leasing plans.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 LeasingAPI.compare_plans, 它的参数输入如下: 'vehicleType'是'luxury', 'leaseDuration'是'36', 'initialPayment'是'10000'.
